title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 490.0 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 490.0 - Scope

State Regulations

This Part sets forth the procedures and requirements for
operating a residence for adults. A residence for adults is a type of adult
care facility as defined by section
2
of the

Social Services Law. The department's authority to regulate residences for
adults is set forth in section
460
of the

Social Services Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
490.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
